subject: Wheel software issue
description_text:
Hello, I ordered the wheel from your website but it is not being recognized
within the software to allow me to adjust the settings or setup the
buttons.

Is there something I need to do to get the software to recognize it? Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Bryce Loll, If the steering wheel indicator light is on, please check by connecting the wheel to a rear USB 3.0 port on your PC, or use a powered USB hub. In addition, please use the VKB tool to verify whether the device is detected.Â
